Why would Miyoi smell like Yukari? ðŸ¤”

I do like how ZUN basically shot down the prospect early on in the manga. Yukari would have fit right in being a Geidontei semi-regular â€“ maybe having Miyoi make more classy drinks for her.

Come to think of it, this kind of setting would have been so interesting. That instead of being a place for the regulars to discuss the events of the chapter, we have Geidontei as a more neutral establishment where many other characters get to interact with one another in such a setting. A ***Restaurant to Another World*** kind of vibe where ZUN may play around with different characters in a more flexible context.

Yeah, I like [***Purple Summit.***](https://mangadex.org/title/4a84ecda-e5be-42c8-bddf-c4c0dc8dbf5d/touhou-purple-summit)
